survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee participation and satisfaction with the company's volunteer programs, identifying opportunities for improvement and alignment with employee interests.

questions.question_text: Have you participated in any corporate-sponsored volunteer programs in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: This initial filter question helps segment respondents for relevant follow-up questions.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Have you participated in any corporate-sponsored volunteer programs in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the volunteer opportunities provided by the company?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for nuanced feedback.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the volunteer opportunities provided by the company?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What types of volunteer activities would you prefer the company to offer? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to identify popular categories.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkboxes for multi-choice selection; include an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of volunteer activities would you prefer the company to offer? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you faced while participating in the volunteer programs.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you faced while participating in the volunteer programs.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if respondent answered 'Yes' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to participate in future volunteer programs? (Select up to 3)
questions.scripter_notes: Checkboxes with a max selection limit of 3; include optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors would encourage you to participate in future volunteer programs? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Do you believe the company’s volunteer programs align with its corporate values?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure perception of program alignment.

script.question_text: Do you believe the company’s volunteer programs align with its corporate values?
